bio: This foul-tempered fellow stamps his feet constantly, making it hard to take him seriously.

soultimate.name: Angry Cross Cut
soultimate.description: Hit foe with a barrage of hits for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Atk ↑ when attacked, 2% ↑ per hit, lasts till death.
skill.name: That All You Got?

name: Hissfit
